skill.name: json-transformer
skill.description: Transform, manipulate, and analyze JSON data structures with advanced operations.
skill.summary: Transform, manipulate, and analyze JSON data structures with advanced operations.
skill.author: CuriousLearner

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill containing only markdown documentation and AI instructions for JSON transformation tasks. No executable code, no network access, no file system access, and no external commands. The skill is a knowledge base that guides AI behavior.

content.value_statement: JSON data often comes in complex nested structures that are hard to work with. This skill provides expert guidance for parsing, transforming, validating, and converting JSON for any use case.
actual_capabilities: Parse and validate JSON from strings, files, and APIs
Transform nested objects and arrays with flattening and unflattening
Extract data using JSONPath and JMESPath queries
Convert JSON to CSV, YAML, and XML formats
Merge and combine JSON documents with deep merging
Generate JSON schemas from data structures
limitations: Skill provides guidance only, does not execute transformations itself
Does not validate external JSON schemas or API contracts
Cannot access local files without explicit user request

use_cases.title: API Response Transformation
use_cases.description: Transform complex API responses into clean application-ready formats

use_cases.title: Data Pipeline Conversion
use_cases.description: Convert between JSON and other formats for data pipeline workflows

use_cases.title: Config File Management
use_cases.description: Merge and validate configuration files across environments

prompt_templates.title: Parse and Format
prompt_templates.prompt: Parse and pretty-print this JSON data, then identify any formatting issues and suggest fixes.

prompt_templates.title: Extract Data
prompt_templates.prompt: Extract all email addresses from users over age 25 using JSONPath syntax from this data structure.

prompt_templates.title: Convert Format
prompt_templates.prompt: Convert this JSON array to CSV format with proper headers for spreadsheet import.

prompt_templates.title: Merge Configs
prompt_templates.prompt: Deep merge these two configuration files, showing me where values were overridden.

output_examples.input: Convert this user data to CSV format: [{"name": "Alice", "role": "admin"}, {"name": "Bob", "role": "user"}]

best_practices: Always validate JSON structure before performing transformations
Use JSONPath or JMESPath for complex data extraction queries
Test transformations on sample data before applying to production
anti_patterns: Manually editing deeply nested JSON instead of using transformation functions
Skipping validation when merging configuration files
Converting large JSON files to CSV without flattening nested structures first

faq.question: What tools support JSON transformation?
faq.answer: Python json module, jq CLI, jmespath, and jsonpath-ng are common tools for JSON operations.

faq.question: What are size limits for JSON processing?
faq.answer: Processing limits depend on available memory. Use streaming parsers for files over 100MB.

faq.question: How do I integrate with existing code?
faq.answer: Use language-specific libraries like Python's json module or Node's JSON.stringify for transformations.

faq.question: Is my data safe during transformations?
faq.answer: Transformations run locally in memory. No data is sent to external services without explicit request.

faq.question: Why is my JSON not parsing correctly?
faq.answer: Check for trailing commas, unescaped quotes, and wrong encoding. Use a JSON validator tool.

faq.question: How is this different from jq?
faq.answer: This skill provides AI guidance while jq is a command-line tool. They work well together.
